alert.note: Alert for Inland Dixie; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 9:03PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette and northeastern Dixie Counties through 945 PM EST... At 903 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cross City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Shamrock, Cross City Airport, Grady, Hatch Bend, Eugene, Fletcher, Guaranto Springs and Fletcher Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
